sections.heading: Core Function
sections.content:
を marks the direct object - what receives the action of the verb.

Pronunciation: Written を but pronounced "o" (same as お)

本を読む hon wo yomu "read a book" (book is the direct object)

children.heading: 1. Direct Object of Action
children.content:
With transitive verbs:

水を飲む - "drink water" 寿司を食べる - "eat sushi" 映画を見る - "watch a movie" 音楽を聞く - "listen to music" 手紙を書く - "write a letter"

children.heading: 2. Movement Through Space
children.content:
Mark the space you move through:

道を歩く - "walk along the road" 橋を渡る - "cross the bridge" 空を飛ぶ - "fly through the sky" 公園を散歩する - "stroll through the park"

children.heading: 3. Point of Departure
children.content:
With 出る (leave):

家を出る - "leave the house" 会社を出る - "leave the company"

children.heading: を vs が
children.content: 本を読む - "read a book" (action on object) 本がある - "there is a book" (existence) 本が好き - "like books" (が with 好き)

children.heading: を vs に
children.content: 学校を出る - "leave school" (departure point) 学校に行く - "go to school" (destination)

children.heading: を vs で
children.content: 本を読む - "read a book" (object) 図書館で読む - "read at library" (location)

children.heading: Consumption
children.content: 食べる - eat 飲む - drink

children.heading: Perception
children.content: 見る - see/watch 聞く - hear/listen

children.heading: Communication
children.content: 読む - read 書く - write 話す - speak 言う - say

children.heading: Actions
children.content: 買う - buy 売る - sell 作る - make する - do 開ける - open 閉める - close

children.heading: Intransitive Verbs
children.content: ✗ 家をある (exist) ✓ 家がある ✗ 公園をいる (exist/be) ✓ 公園にいる

children.heading: State Verbs
children.content: ✗ 寿司を好き ✓ 寿司が好き ✗ 日本語をできる ✓ 日本語ができる

children.heading: Destination (use に)
children.content: ✗ 学校を行く ✓ 学校に行く

sections.heading: Omitting を
sections.content:
In casual speech, を is often dropped:

Formal: 水を飲む Casual: 水飲む "drink water" Formal: 本を読んだ Casual: 本読んだ "read a book"

sections.heading: Multiple を Objects
sections.content:
Some compound verbs take multiple を:

手を洗う - "wash hands" 席を立つ - "leave one's seat" 時間を過ごす - "spend time"

sections.heading: を with Movement Verbs
sections.content:
Special usage with movement through space:

角を曲がる - "turn the corner" 階段を上る - "go up stairs" 階段を下りる - "go down stairs"

sections.heading: Transitive vs Intransitive
sections.content:
Many verbs come in pairs:

| Transitive (を) | Intransitive (が) | | --------------- | ----------------- | | 開ける (open) | 開く (open) | | 閉める (close) | 閉まる (close) | | 始める (begin) | 始まる (begin) |

ドアを開ける - "open the door" (action) ドアが開く - "the door opens" (state change)

sections.heading: Common Patterns
sections.content:
[Object] を [Verb] 本を読みます - "read a book" コーヒーを飲みます - "drink coffee" 日本語を勉強します - "study Japanese"

With location:

[Place] で [Object] を [Verb] 図書館で本を読みます "read a book at the library"

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ Marks direct object of action ✓ Written を, pronounced "o" ✓ With transitive verbs only ✓ Cannot use with 好き/できる/ある ✓ Often dropped in casual speech ✓ Also marks movement through space

Related:

に (ni) - Location/Direction で (de) - Location/Means Transitive vs Intransitive
